Title: The Farstriders
Legend: Sanson Farstrider is one of the most experienced Hunter-Primes in the Hammers of Sigmar. He and his band of veteran rangers specialise in undertaking the most critical and death defying of missions behind enemy lines.
Intro: The models in The Farstriders are Sanson Farstrider, Almeric Eagle-eye and Elias Swiftblade. Each is armed with a Boltstorm Pistol and Stormwrought Weapon.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: Sanson Farstrider is the unit champion. Sanson Farstrider is accompanied by a Star Falcon and carries an Astral Compass. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that modelâ€™s Stormwrought Weapon.

Rules.Name: Astral Compass
Rules.Fluff: The astral compass shows the best route to take in order to strike the foe.
Rules.Rule: If this unit includes Sanson Farstrider, at the start of your movement phase, instead of making a normal move, you can say that this unit will navigate the winds aetheric. If you do so, remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield wholly within 6" of the battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Rules.Name: Star Falcon
Rules.Fluff: Farstrider's loyal companion can swoop from the skies to strike the enemy.
Rules.Rule: If this unit includes Sanson Farstrider, at the start of your shooting phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of this unit and roll a dice. On a 4+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
